Author: Wade
Message: Hello!

Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome Wade.

Author: Wade
Message: Hi there!

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Wade
Message: No problem! What's your major?

Author: Moderator
Message: Psychology & Human Cognition

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Wade
Message: Oooh a game! How exciting! I'm ready!

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Wade
Message: Okay!

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Wade
Message: Can he be named HAL?

Author: Wade
Message: Sorry! Sorry, I'll be good.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Wade
Message: Yes I do.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Wade
Message: I am ready!

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Wade
Message: Hi there Andrew!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Wade
Message: So far so good. It's my day off, so I've been relaxing. How has your day been? Been up to much?

Author: Andrew
Message: I've been alright too. Mostly playing games actually.

Author: Wade
Message: What kind of games do you like to play?

Author: Andrew
Message: Minecraft is the one I play the most. I've also been enjoying Mass Effect for the last week.

Author: Wade
Message: I've never played Mass Effect before. What game mechanics do you like the most?

Author: Andrew
Message: What do you mean? Specifically in Mass Effect or in general?

Author: Wade
Message: Specifically in Mass Effect. What do you like about the gameplay?

Author: Andrew
Message: I like how the plot depends on your choices and actions. It's not really gameplay, but the characters are also fantastic.

Author: Wade
Message: Do you prefer FPS or TPS?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not a huge fan of shooter games in general, but I guess Mass Effect could be labeled as a TPS, so I'll say that.

Author: Wade
Message: What else do you do for fun? Any hobbies?

Author: Andrew
Message: I like reading, but I haven't been able to do that enough for a while actually.

Author: Wade
Message: What have you been up to besides reading?

Author: Andrew
Message: College work mostly. I study Biology.

Author: Wade
Message: What kind of biology is your passion? Human biology, marine biology, avian biology, something else?

Author: Andrew
Message: Neurology actually. That kinda goes across all of what you said. But more specifically human neurology.

Author: Wade
Message: I find the brain so complex. Do you think we'll ever fully understand the human mind?

Author: Andrew
Message: If we do, I doubt that it will be anytime soon.

Author: Wade
Message: How long have you been in school?

Author: Andrew
Message: Well, I'm in my 3rd year of university. So... yeah.

Author: Wade
Message: What are your plans for the future? What would you like to do with your major?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'd like to do research. I want to figure out how neurons interact with each other and how we learn.

Author: Wade
Message: I like to figure that out too. I'm an Instructor, so I like to see how better I can teach my students.

Author: Andrew
Message: There's quite a few studies that have been made about that actually.

Author: Wade
Message: I know that. My mother was a school  psychologist, so I normally ask her for new information.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Wade
Message: Is it bad that I was taking notes?

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to? (This is not your final answer)

Author: Moderator
Message: (It's fine)

Author: Wade
Message: It is hard to tell. I tried to slip the actor up, but I know good AI's are not put off by that. I'm leaning toward AI, actually.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll begin the next conversation. Andrew will start, then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Wade
Message: I am ready.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Wade
Message: Hi there!

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Wade
Message: I'm alright. How are you? What all have you been up to today?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright. I haven't been up to much really. Mostly just playing games. You?

Author: Wade
Message: I'm mostly watching Judge Judy. Is it odd that it helps me concentrate?

Author: Andrew
Message: I can't tell, I've never seen that actually.

Author: Wade
Message: It's pretty fun. What sort of hobbies do you have? Any favorite types of games?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah, I tend to spend my time playing Minecraft. and I've been very much into Mass Effect for the last week or so. What about you?

Author: Wade
Message: I play a ton of Warframe. Ever played that? It's super fun.

Author: Andrew
Message: I don't think I've even ever heard about it no. What is it?

Author: Wade
Message: It's a beautiful combination of hack-n-slash and TPS. I like TPS over FPS. What do you prefer?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not really sure. I haven't liked many FPS games, so I guess I like TPS more.

Author: Wade
Message: What is it about TPS that makes you like it more?

Author: Andrew
Message: I can't say I like it more specifically. But I do tend to like games that are in TPS. So I don't really know.

Author: Wade
Message: How do you feel about AI? Will it ever sound like a human?

Author: Andrew
Message: I don't know about sound, but I'd say that we're getting closer about text at least. A good question might be : does it need to feel like a human?

Author: Wade
Message: If the objective is to mimic humans, then I say yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well yeah. If it's about being useful it's another topic entirely.

Author: Wade
Message: I agree. Do you think robots will replace humans in the workforce? Is that a good thing?

Author: Andrew
Message: I do, to some extent. Whether it's a good thing or not depends on if we're able to anticipate it enough by rethinking our societies.

Author: Wade
Message: The human brain and societies is interesting to me, being an instructor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Wade
Message: I think I got this.

Author: Wade
Message: The first interaction was the AI.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Wade
Message: Thanks!

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, feel free to do so now. Otherwise you can now close this window.
